original_text: Thus there fell to Manasseh ten portions, besides the land of Gilead and Bashan, which is on the other side of the Jordan,
korean_text: 요단 동쪽 길르앗과 바산 외에 므낫세에게 열 분깃이 돌아갔으니

sentences.original_text: Thus there fell to Manasseh ten portions,
besides the land of Gilead and Bashan,
which is on the other side of the Jordan,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅은 요단 강 건너편에 있더라.
